Trigger.name: Legacy Flyers
Trigger.script: if Legacy.NDB.Enemies[matches[2]] then if gmcp.Char.Status.class == "dragon" then send("becalm") else send("touch tentacle " .. matches[2]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You recognise the form of (\w+) high above\.$
^(\w+) begins to flap \w+ wings powerfully, and rises quickly up into the firmament\.$
^(\w+) is quickly carried up into the skies\.$
^(\w+) grabs hold of a nearby branch and swings up and out of sight into the treetops\.$
^(\w+) crouches down upon \w+ haunches, then with a powerful thrust of \w+ legs, launches \w+ straight up into the air\.$
^(\w+) swoops down from above, tries to hoist \w+, and fails\.$
^(\w+) sucks in \w+ breath, and with a mighty blast of air exhales while uttering a word of magic\. Suddenly, \w+ is lifted into the skies by an unseen force\.$
